about_the_game:
Prepare for a sneak peek into the hilariously action-packed world of 'Fight'N'Jokes' with our exclusive demo version. In this limited preview, you'll get a taste of the intergalactic showdown as a sinister phantom menace threatens the once-humorous realm of the Jokes.

In this demo, you can choose from two unique characters, each with their own distinctive abilities and personalities. Engage in fierce battles against formidable opponents as you explore the rich gameplay and strategic combat that 'Fight'N'Jokes' has to offer.

As you delve into the world of the demo, you'll witness the malevolent Dark Father's sinister plan to transform planets into rubbish dumps. Your mission is to thwart his nefarious scheme and protect the planet Joke from jestful annihilation.

Embracing a retro gaming aesthetic, our demo version faithfully emulates the nostalgic resolution of 320x200, reminiscent of classic MS-DOS games from the '90s. Experience a taste of the full game's captivating storylines, quirky character interactions, and comically bizarre showdowns.

Highlights of the Demo:

  • Choose from two unique characters, each with their own backstory and motivations.
  • Engage in thrilling battles against challenging opponents to get a sense of the game's combat mechanics.
  • Experience a sneak peek of the overarching storyline and the impending threat of the Dark Father.
  • Embrace the retro gaming vibes with our faithful recreation of the '90s MS-DOS resolution.
  • While this demo offers a glimpse into the world of 'Fight'N'Jokes,' the full version boasts a whopping 14 characters to choose from, including 4 secret characters. Dive deeper into the hilarity and adventure as you unlock additional characters, achievements, and laughter-inducing experiences.

Get ready to embark on a side-splitting adventure and take your first steps towards becoming the savior of the Jokes in this exciting demo, with even more surprises awaiting you in the full version!

name: Fight'N'Jokes Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows Vista or Later
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant video card
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. Gamepad highly recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Fight'N'Jokes is a side-splittingly nostalgic 2D fighting game with a dash of humor. It playfully parodies the serious side of fighting games while delivering a hilarious retro experience.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
